A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing\, almost seemed like a parody the first half of the movie. There are a few cool scenes but it enough to redeem it. The movie doesn't take itself seriously- more like a spaceballs entry. Many places like the casino didn't even feel like Star Wars\, looked like it was right out of Vegas. The climax builds up and fizzles outnwith a lackluster duel and ride itself if characters without any kind of proper send off. Luke's activities since RotJ doesn't make a lot of sense and is disappointing that he's done literally nothing but be a hermit...If you want a real episode vi\, vii\, viii\, then read the Thrawn trilogy...
